results.content: I enjoyed this course. There was a fair amount of information that I already knew, but it served as a good refresher and also did teach me some new things. As a suggestion; the captions here are clearly auto-generated, and frequently display the wrong word as the generator misinterprets the lecturer's accent. It would be appropriate for an accessibility course to have accurate, hand-generated captions.
results.content_html: I enjoyed this course. There was a fair amount of information that I already knew, but it served as a good refresher and also did teach me some new things. results.content: I liked the interactive part of the course!
results.content_html: I liked the interactive part of the course!

results.content:
The course is good. But I find the powerpoints a bit boring.

I am a visual person who learns better when I see the person explaining. I find that for an accessibility course the course could be more accessible on its own.

results.content: Very informative and easy to follow. He covers the basics very well and gives a lot of useful tips and tools.
results.content_html: Very informative and easy to follow. He covers the basics very well and gives a lot of useful tips and tools.

results.content: Just starting to retrospective make webpages meet AA guidelines.  Go material presented in this course that I haven't seen elsewhere.  Examples: ARIA examples, discussion when when to use button and when to use link and why it's important to match function as opposed to styling for appearance sake, and examples of differences between AA and AAA levels for video accessibility.
results.content_html: Just starting to retrospective make webpages meet AA guidelines. Go material presented in this course that I haven't seen elsewhere. Examples: ARIA examples, discussion when when to use button and when to use link and why it's important to match function as opposed to styling for appearance sake, and examples of differences between AA and AAA levels for video accessibility.

results.content: This course was very helpful, I realized I know more than I thought but also picked up some very good tips for my web development!
results.content_html: This course was very helpful, I realized I know more than I thought but also picked up some very good tips for my web development!

results.content: O curso é bom para iniciantes e intermédios em aceesibilidade web. É um curso intensivo ótimo para quem não tem muito tempo.

results.content: Great instructor! Very detailed, but at a good pace. Highly recommended!
results.content_html: Great instructor! Very detailed, but at a good pace. Highly recommended!

results.content: This was so great! Bite-sized information I absorbed quickly and can remember later. Informative, concise, and to the point. Awesome. Thanks!
results.content_html: This was so great! Bite-sized information I absorbed quickly and can remember later. Informative, concise, and to the point. Awesome. Thanks!

results.content: Pensé que tenía mas contenido, el curso es concreto al menos y a nivel básico cumple con lineamientos, buenas prácticas y herramientas on-the-go para apoyar y liderar iniciativas de diseño.
results.content_html: Pensé que tenía mas contenido, el curso es concreto al menos y a nivel básico cumple con lineamientos, buenas prácticas y herramientas on-the-go para apoyar y liderar iniciativas de diseño.

results.content: Good course,  Although I am very familiar with accessibility, there were a couple things that I didn't know...which is exactly what I wanted from this course... so thanks. :)
results.content_html: Good course, Although I am very familiar with accessibility, there were a couple things that I didn't know...which is exactly what I wanted from this course... so thanks. :)

results.content: I recently graduated from a UX design bootcamp and enrolled in this course in the hope of supplementing my understanding of accessible design. I didn't know how much of this topic I hadn't been exposed to! This course was hugely informative, very clear and understandable, and has sparked an interest for further exploration. Highly recommend!
results.content_html: I recently graduated from a UX design bootcamp and enrolled in this course in the hope of supplementing my understanding of accessible design. I didn't know how much of this topic I hadn't been exposed to! This course was hugely informative, very clear and understandable, and has sparked an interest for further exploration. Highly recommend!

results.content: The instructor was great and the lesson are direct and easy to understand but I feel like it's missing a bit more on the technical level and it doesn't talk a lot about things like modern frameworks and design systems. It also doesn't talk about touch interfaces, such as mobile.
results.content_html: The instructor was great and the lesson are direct and easy to understand but I feel like it's missing a bit more on the technical level and it doesn't talk a lot about things like modern frameworks and design systems. It also doesn't talk about touch interfaces, such as mobile.

results.content: Really enjoyed the course, covers the basics and I would recommend firing up CodePen and try writing out test layouts and getting familiar with the role and wai-aria attributes, that's what I'm doing as well as reading a book on Accessibility by Haydon Pickering. A ton to learn for this but the course is useful for anyone looking to get to a higher level awareness of whats required to make universally accessible websites.
results.content_html: Really enjoyed the course, covers the basics and I would recommend firing up CodePen and try writing out test layouts and getting familiar with the role and wai-aria attributes, that's what I'm doing as well as reading a book on Accessibility by Haydon Pickering. A ton to learn for this but the course is useful for anyone looking to get to a higher level awareness of whats required to make universally accessible websites.

results.content: Really heplful to enhance basic skills of web Accessibility.
